description: WPF client DI setup requires the base project structure to be in place.
mitigation_plan: Task is assigned in the same sprint to the same team.

description: Authentication Service requires the implemented Repository Pattern to access user data.
mitigation_plan: Repository pattern is implemented in Sprint 1, Auth Service in Sprint 2.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire user login feature.

description: The pgcrypto ValueConverter needs the secure credential service to fetch the encryption key.
mitigation_plan: Secure credential store is built in Sprint 1, before the encryption feature in Sprint 2.

description: DICOM SCP listener needs the RabbitMQ publisher infrastructure to queue metadata for processing.
mitigation_plan: RabbitMQ infrastructure is a Sprint 1 deliverable, well ahead of the DICOM feature in Sprint 3.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire asynchronous DICOM ingestion pipeline.
